text.sneakutils.title: Sneak Options
option.sneakutils.noLedgeClipping: Fall at block edges when sneaking
option.sneakutils.tooltip.legacySneak: When sneaking use the old player height.
option.sneakutils.tooltip.legacySneakPos: When sneaking the player's feet don't go inside the ground. (visual only)
option.sneakutils.tooltip.noLedgeClippin: When sneaking at the corner of a block, let the player fall.
option.sneakutils.tooltip.cameraLerpMode: Which function to use when interpolating the camera sneak movement.
option.sneakutils.tooltip.cameraLerpDura: How long in ticks should the camera interpolation last.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.sneakutil:
Some sneaky stuff ;)
Allows for different sneaking configurations per world/server.
